**Tender Title:** RCMP Annual Helicopter Pilot Training, Airbus H125 (AS350B3) and H120 (EC120B)
---

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide annual helicopter pilot training services for H125 (AS350B3) and H120 (EC120B) aircraft.

**Tender Details:**

* **Solicitation Number:** 202105350
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-03
* **Closing Date and Time:** 2022-10-31, 14:00 hrs EDT (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other applicable trade agreements
* **Region of Opportunity:** Worldwide
* **Region of Delivery:** Canada
* **GSIN:** U099BA, Pilot Training Services, Aircraft

**Background:**

The RCMP requires a contractor to provide training services for annual day/night flight training and mountain training for RCMP H125 (AS3053) and H120 (EC120B) helicopter pilots. The scope of work includes:

* 14 pilots requiring H125 (AS350B3) flight training on an annual basis
* 3 pilots requiring H125 (AS350B3) mountain flight training on an annual basis
* 6 pilots requiring H120 (EC120B) flight training on an annual basis
* 3 pilots requiring H120 (EC120B) mountain flight training on an annual basis

**Contract Details:**

* Contract period: One year from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend for up to four additional one-year periods
* Anticipated start date: 2022-11-15
* Basis of selection: Mandatory Technical Criteria

**Submission Requirements:**

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit via email to [steve.lafontaine@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.lafontaine@rcmp-grc.gc.ca). Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

**Additional Information:**

Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The RCMP has published its National Procurement Plan at www.rcmp-grc.gc.ca/en/rcmp-national-procurement-plan.
